text: Armor for Sleep was an American alternative rock band. They formed in 2001 in New Jersey and disbanded in 2009 because of being inactive and not undertaking a tour for over a year. The members of the group were Ben Jorgensen, the singer, who also played the rhythm guitar, PJ DeCicco, who played the guitar, Anthony DiIonno, who played the Bass guitar and Nash Breen, who played the guitar. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *2003: Dream to Make Believe *2005: What to Do When You Are Dead *2007: Smile for Them ===EPs=== * 2008: The Way Out Is Broken ==References== ==Other websites== *Armor for Sleep's official website Category:American alternative rock bands Category:Emo bands Category:2000s American music groups Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in New Jersey Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2009 Category:2009 disestablishments in the United States Category:2010s disestablishments in New Jersey
title: Armor for Sleep
